name: Army of Squirrels
storyline:
Army of Squirrels now available on Steam: 
 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/793260/Army_of_Squirrels/ 
 
Army of squirrels offers interesting combination of intense tactics and survival. You need to conquer land back while fighting against endless waves of enemies. Specialized units and randomly spawning enemies makes multiple tactics possible. Player is thrown into challenging puzzles with limited resources and only most cunning will prevail.
summary: Army of squirrels offers interesting combination of intense tactics and survival. You need to conquer land back while fighting against endless waves of enemies. Specialized units and randomly spawning enemies makes multiple tactics possible. Player is thrown into challenging puzzles with limited resources and only most cunning will prevail.
